Sheba Marcelah

About me

Hello there! Welcome to my blog. Let me tell you about myself. I am a writer based in Nairobi, Kenya , with a passion for poetry . I love reading them, listening to them , singing them, and on rare occassions you may find me engaged in a live narration. It's my hope that as you read through the lines , you may enjoy reading as I did writing.

Contact me

If you would like to work with me on something , get your poem featured on this platform or just chat, look me up in one of this platforms.
